text: Egha a ua ghaze, “Kɨ nɨ baghɨvɨra ikɨ orarkɨtɨma God damuasa amir biziba mɨkemezɨ moghɨn damuam.” Egha ua ghaze, “Ia gan, kɨ borir God na ganɨngiziba me ko iti.”(2:13) Ezɨ Iesusɨn akar Aisaia 8:17, 18ɨn izezim. Gumazir Hibrun Akɨnafarim Osirizim, en akaghtɨ e fogham, Iesus gumazir igharaziba ko magh gari, me an aveghbuaba ko an boriba. Ezɨ gumazamizir Godɨn mɨzuaiba bizibagh amima, ezɨ Iesus uaghan orarti.
